attributes.action: give equal student loans for partime students so that they can read for there degree
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are a part time student with the open uni you are not able to have 100 percent help with your tuition fees as full time students
we want equal rights for part time and full time students so that all students are not discriminated and they can study what ever subject they want at uni
